explains: n. 不做任何事，不活动，不工作；不活泼；静止，休止状态；不放射性

sentences.en: The inactivity of the government was deplorable.
sentences.cn: 政府的无所作为应受到谴责。

sentences.en: The players have comparatively long periods of inactivity.
sentences.cn: 这些运动员有相当长的一段时间会无所事事。

sentences.en: The obesity epidemic began in the 1980s, and many people attribute it to increased portion sizes and inactivity, but that can't be everything.
sentences.cn: 肥胖在20世纪80年代开始蔓延，许多人将其归咎于食物份量增加和缺乏运动，但这不可能是全部原因。
